text: While I gazed, this fissure rapidly widened - there came a fierce breath of the whirlwind -. mighty walls rushing asunder - there was a long tumultuous shouting sound like the voice. of a thousand waters - and the deep and dank tarn at my feet closed sullenly and silently over the fragments of the "House of Usher.'.
handwritten_text: While I gazed, this fissure rapidly widened - there came a fierce breath of the whirlwind -. mighty walls rushing asunder - there was a long tumultuous shouting sound like the voice. of a thousand waters - and the deep and dank tarn at my feet closed sullenly and silently over the fragments of the "House of Usher.'.
